item.title: research
item.description: Research A list of peer-reviewed publications (13 total, 9 first author) can be found on arXiv or ADS I also maintain a list below. In reverse-chronological order: J. O’Leary, A. Melatos, T. Kimpson, N. J. O’Neill, P. M. Meyers, D. M. Christodoulou, S. Bhattacharya, S. G. T. Laycock : “Measuring the magnetic dipole moment and magnetospheric fluctuations of accretion-powered pulsars in the Small Magellanic Cloud with an unscented Kalman filter”. ApJ 2024, doi: 10.
